levels.title: Your Chess Journey
levels.subtitle: 4 levels. 120 courses. One path to mastery.

pawn.name: Pawn

pawn.description: Master the fundamentals: piece movement, basic tactics, and your first checkmates.

knight.name: Knight
knight.subtitle: Level B — Intermediate
knight.description: Develop tactical vision with forks, pins, and discovered attacks.

queen.name: Queen
queen.subtitle: Level C — Advanced
queen.description: Deepen your strategic understanding and master complex positions.

king.name: King
king.subtitle: Level D — Expert
king.description: Refine your play with grandmaster concepts and competitive preparation.

step1.title: Take the Quiz
step1.description: Answer 20 questions to discover your current level. It only takes 5 minutes.

step2.title: Find Your Coach
step2.description: Browse verified coaches, read reviews, and pick someone who matches your goals.

step3.title: Book & Learn
step3.description: Schedule your first lesson. Your coach will guide you through a personalized curriculum.

step1.description: Showcase your credentials, teaching style, and hourly rate.

step2.title: Set Your Availability
step2.description: Define your schedule. Students book directly — no back-and-forth.

step3.title: Teach & Earn
step3.description: Conduct lessons via HD video. Get paid weekly via Stripe Connect.

step1.title: 1. Find a Coach
step1.description: Browse our list of qualified coaches on the Our Coaches page. Each profile displays:
step1.item2: Average rating and reviews from other students

step2.title: 2. Add a Coach to Favorites
step2.description: When you find a coach you like:
step2.item1: Click the "Add to favorites" button on their profile
step2.item3: Find your favorite coaches in your profile

step3.title: 3. Receive Notifications
step3.premiumNote: Email notifications for new slots from your favorite coaches are reserved for Premium subscribers (4.99 EUR/month).
step3.description: As a Premium subscriber, when one of your favorite coaches publishes a new availability, you immediately receive an email with:

step4.title: 4. Early Access to Slots
step4.premiumNote: Premium subscribers see new slots 24 hours before other players.

step5.title: 5. Book a Lesson
step5.item1: Go to the coach's profile or click "Book" from the email
step5.item3: Pay via Stripe or use your wallet balance
step5.item4: The coach receives your request and confirms the lesson

step6.title: 6. First Lesson Free
step6.description: New to mychess? Your first lesson is 100% free! Book without paying to discover the platform.

step1.title: 1. Create Your Availability
step1.item2: Choose the day and times (minimum 1 hour)
step1.item3: Choose a one-time or recurring slot (weekly)
step1.item4: Save: your slots are immediately visible

step2.title: 2. Automatic Student Notifications
step2.description: When you publish a new availability:
step2.item1: All players who have you as a favorite with notifications enabled
step2.item3: Automatically receive an email about the new slot
step2.tip: Publish your availability regularly to retain your Premium students. They'll be the first to know!

step3.title: 3. Manage Bookings
step3.item2: You have 24 hours to confirm the lesson
step3.item3: If you don't confirm, the lesson is cancelled and the student refunded

step4.title: 4. Give the Lesson
step4.item3: At the end, mark the lesson as completed

step5.title: 5. Receive Your Payments
step5.description: Set up your Stripe Connect account in settings to receive earnings directly to your bank account.

premium.title: Premium Benefits
premium.description: Premium subscription at 4.99 EUR/month offers you:
premium.notifications: Priority notifications: receive an email when a favorite coach posts a slot
premium.earlyAccess: Early access: see new slots 24h before others
premium.recordings: Replay: access video recordings of your lessons
premium.training: Training: play against myChessBot after your lessons
premium.badge: Premium badge: a golden badge on your profile

noNotifications.question: Why am I not receiving notifications?
noNotifications.item1: You have added the coach to favorites
noNotifications.item2: You have enabled "Notify me of new slots"
noNotifications.item4: Your email is valid and emails are not in spam

enableNotifications.question: How do I enable notifications for a coach?
enableNotifications.answer: Go to the coach's profile, click "Add to favorites", then enable the notification option.

freeNotifications.question: Are notifications free?
freeNotifications.answer: Email notifications for new slots are reserved for Premium subscribers. Confirmation and reminder notifications are free for everyone.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay per lesson. Upgrade for extra perks.

hero.title: Level Up Your Game
hero.subtitle: Unlock exclusive features to accelerate your chess improvement

pricing.signupAndTry: Sign up and try for free
pricing.premiumPlayersOnly: Premium subscription is for players only

premium.title: Premium Subscription
premium.trial: 14 days free trial - No credit card required

benefits.title: Premium Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Everything you need to progress quickly

replay.title: Unlimited Replay
replay.description: Access video recordings of all your past lessons. Review analyzed games, openings, and endgames at your own pace, as many times as you need.

alerts.title: Favorite Coach Alerts
alerts.description: Be the first to know when your favorite coaches publish new slots. Never miss an opportunity to book with your preferred coach.

bot.title: myChessBot Training
bot.description: Practice against our integrated chess engine after each lesson. 5 difficulty levels adapted to your progression for continuous improvement.

badge.title: Premium Badge
badge.description: Show your commitment with a golden badge visible on your profile. Show coaches that you're a serious and motivated player.

trial.question: How does the free trial work?
trial.answer: The free trial gives you access to all Premium features for 14 days, without entering a credit card. At the end of the trial, you can choose to subscribe or not.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, the subscription has no commitment. You can cancel anytime from your subscription page. You'll keep Premium access until the end of the paid period.

secure.question: Is payment secure?
secure.answer: Absolutely. We use Stripe, the world leader in online payments. Your banking details are encrypted and never stored on our servers.

freeLessons.question: Does Premium include free lessons?
freeLessons.answer: No, Premium subscription gives you access to exclusive features (replay, notifications, etc.). Lessons are paid separately at each coach's rate (30-80 EUR/hour).

cta.title: Ready to progress faster?
cta.subtitle: Join Premium players and accelerate your chess learning

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not happy with your first paid lesson? We'll refund it. No questions asked.

contact.title: Didn't find your answer?
contact.subtitle: Our team is here to help

whatIsMychess.a: mychess is an online platform connecting chess players with verified coaches. We offer a structured learning path with 120 courses across 4 skill levels, live video lessons, and progress tracking.

howToStart.a: Create a free account, take our 5-minute assessment quiz to determine your level, then browse coaches and book your first lesson. Your first lesson is free!

whoAreCoaches.a: Our coaches are verified chess players and instructors with ratings and credentials displayed on their profiles. You can read reviews from other students before booking.

howBookLesson.q: How do I book a lesson?
howBookLesson.a: Find a coach you like, view their available time slots, and book directly. You'll receive a confirmation email with the video call link.

howLessonsWork.a: Lessons happen via Jitsi Meet — a free, browser-based video platform. No download needed. Your coach will share their screen to demonstrate moves and analyze games.

lessonDuration.a: Standard lessons are 1 hour. Coaches may offer different durations — check their profile for options.

cancelLesson.a: Yes. Cancel more than 24 hours before for a full refund. Between 2-24 hours: 50% refund. Less than 2 hours: no refund. If a coach cancels, you always get a full refund.

firstLessonFree.q: Is the first lesson really free?
firstLessonFree.a: Yes! New players get their first lesson completely free — no credit card required. It's our way of helping you find the right coach.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: We accept all major credit cards via Stripe. You can also add funds to your wallet for faster checkout.

coachRates.a: Coaches set their own rates, typically between 30-80 per hour. You'll see the price before booking.

premiumBenefits.a: Premium (4.99/month) gives you lesson recordings, priority notifications when favorite coaches post slots, a profile badge, and access to practice games vs myChessBot.

becomeCoach.q: How do I become a coach?
becomeCoach.a: Sign up as a coach, complete your profile with your credentials and teaching experience, set your hourly rate and availability. Once approved, students can book you.

coachPayments.a: Coaches receive payments weekly via Stripe Connect. Set up your payout account in Settings. Platform fee is 12.5% (10% platform + 2.5% Stripe).

technicalRequirements.q: What do I need for video lessons?
technicalRequirements.a: A computer or tablet with a webcam, microphone, and stable internet. Lessons run in your browser — no software to install.

mobileApp.a: The website works great on mobile browsers. A dedicated app is coming soon!

dataPrivacy.a: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption, never store credit card details, and comply with GDPR. See our Privacy Policy for details.
